mapper.insert: insert into t_user(Id, UserName, PassWord, Sex, Age, Email) values(null, #{UserName}, #{PassWord}, #{Sex}, #{Age}, #{Email})
mapper.select: select * from t_user where UserName = #{username} and Id = 2 # select * from t_user where Id = 2 and UserName = '${username}'
